text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/cited-medium defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
internet Internet Online publication in a periodic release. Used to match NLM JournalIssue CitedMedium code for online version.
print Print Print publication in a periodic release. Used to match NLM JournalIssue CitedMedium code for print version.
offline-digital-storage Offline Digital Storage Publication in a physical device for electronic data storage, organized in issues for periodic release.
internet-without-issue Internet without issue Online publication without any periodic release. Used for article specific publication date which could be the same as or different from journal issue publication date.
print-without-issue Print without issue Print publication without any periodic release.
offline-digital-storage-without-issue Offline Digital Storage without issue Publication in a physical device for electronic data storage, without any periodic release.

concept.definition: Online publication in a periodic release. Used to match NLM JournalIssue CitedMedium code for online version.
Print publication in a periodic release. Used to match NLM JournalIssue CitedMedium code for print version.
Publication in a physical device for electronic data storage, organized in issues for periodic release.
Online publication without any periodic release. Used for article specific publication date which could be the same as or different from journal issue publication date.
Print publication without any periodic release.
Publication in a physical device for electronic data storage, without any periodic release.
